revised_title: Kerguelen Island's Zoological and Petrological Discoveries
tldr: The article discusses the zoological and petrological collections made during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez in 1874-75. It focuses on the species of Crustacea found in Kerguelen Island, their characteristics, and their distribution in the Antarctic region. The author also describes the different species of Serolis, Sphceroma, Arcturus, Caprella, and Fycnogonida discovered during the expeditions.
